field.name: summary
field.value: Add a type parameter to the methods : CreateSchema, DropSchema, GenerateCreationScript and GenerateDropScript

field.name: description
field.value:
This is in case of usage of multiple databases. Adding a type parameter allow to create schema, drop schema, generate creation script, generate drop script for a specific database. This type parameter must be an abstract base active record class.
The modification is in Framework/ActiveRecordStarter.cs and is very simple. Source code is in the attached source file.
